title: West Michigan has economic momentum, but sees signs of slowdown
description: West Michigan remains a leader in job and population growth across Michigan, but there are signs momentum has slowed amid staffing challenges, tariffs and the rise of artificial intelligence.

title: Ancestral Bloodlines: The One-Drop Rule in the Age of Artificial Intelligence
description: By Dr. Carolyn Haliburton Carter, Guest Columnist Exploring the collision of race, identity, and machine logic—how data-driven technologies are reimagining old racial hierarchies in digital form. title: Trump muscles forward on AI executive order
description: President Donald Trump threatened to sign an artificial intelligence executive order that would establish federal laws superseding states' rights.
content:

title: Nvidia Set to Win US Approval to Export H200 AI Chips to China
description: The Trump administration is poised to allow Nvidia Corp. to sell its H200 artificial intelligence chip to China, according to people familiar with the matter, a move that would mark a major lobbying win for the world’s most valuable company and potentially let it regain billions of dollars of business lost in a key global market.
